name: GPT-4o mini
description: A more efficient and cost-effective version of GPT-4o with similar capabilities

skills.name: Text Generation
skills.description: Generate coherent and contextually relevant text based on input prompts
examples: Write a short story about time travel
Draft an email to a colleague about project updates
Create a product description for an e-commerce site

skills.name: Image Understanding
skills.description: Analyze and interpret images to provide relevant information
examples: What objects are in this image?
Describe what you see in this photo
What text is shown in this screenshot?
